thread.section_title: Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An iconic, stylish and memorable hotel stay
thread.title_full: An iconic, stylish and memorable hotel stay - Review of Hotel Molitor Paris - MGallery Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tom G
title: An iconic, stylish and memorable hotel stay
text: My wife and I had a lovely stay at the Molitor in September time, I recommend this as a romantic venue for couples. Our room was modern, well equipped and comfortable, the outdoor pool was fabulous, and the communal facilities were very stylish too. The history of the Molitor had been really cleverly woven into the interior design, including both its Art Deco origins and its more recent history. I'd certainly be happy to stay there again next time we are in Paris.
